Title: Prohibits tethering, restraining, caging or penning of dogs outside between the hours of 7 p.m. to 6 a.m.
Summary: Prohibits tethering, restraining, caging or penning of dogs outdoors between the hours of 7 p.m. to 6 a.m.; provides dogs may be tethered outdoors between the hours of 6 a.m. and 7 p.m. to a stationary object or a pen or cage in a sized pen or cage four times the height and length of said dog.
LawCode: Add ยง353-g, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to the tethering of dogs
